C Phrygian is the third mode of the Ab major scale\
C Phrygian Scale Notes: C Db Eb F G Ab Bb\
Phrygian Scale Formula: 1 b2 b3 4 5 b6 b7\
Phrygian Scale Intervals: H W W W H W W
